item.title: SaHMA3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: SaHMA3 Gene Name: P 1B -type ATPase gene Genome: Species: Sedum alfredii Functional Descriptions: Enhanced expression of SaHMA3 plays critical roles in Cd hyperaccumulation and hypertolerance in Cd hyperaccumulator Sedum alfredii Hance.
